程序包 game.interfaces

接口 Enemy

所有已知实现类:
AldrichTheDevourer, Enemy, LordOfCinder, MimicOrChest, Skeleton, Undead, YhormTheGiant
public interface Enemy

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void heal​(int points)
    Add points to the current Actor's hitpoint total.
    void removeCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
    Remove a capability from this Actor.

  • 方法详细资料

    • heal

      void heal​(int points)
      Add points to the current Actor's hitpoint total. This cannot take the hitpoints over the Actor's maximum. If there is an overflow, hitpoints are silently capped at the maximum. Does not check for consciousness: unconscious Actors can still be healed if the game client allows.
      参数:
      points - number of hitpoints to add.

    • removeCapability

      void removeCapability​(java.lang.Enum<?> capability)
      Remove a capability from this Actor.
      参数:
      capability - the Capability to remove
